summary: A detailed texture replacer for most of Skyrim's monsterlike creatures
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/15708-1-1335114476.png[/IMG][/center]

Now with optional Lore Friendly Draugr texture: no blood and cork dry skin!

[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OUDRSp0.jpg[/IMG][/center]

[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZzRha.jpg[/IMG][/center]

[color="#FFA500"]=================
Description
=================[/color]

This is a texturepack that replaces the textures for the following creatures:
Draugrs, Draugr Females, Falmers, Giants, Cave Trolls, Frost Trolls and Hagravens.

I created the textures the way I envisioned them, by either adding more muscletone, veins, skincolor, dirty teeth, hair, eye colors and so on:
Falmers now look much more like foul creatures from the dark depths instead of wrinkled gnomes
Draugr look more zombielike and gory
Trolls look much more foul and menacing
Hagravens look scarier now
Giants are less aged and look much more muscular

[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3lGT8.jpg[/IMG][/center]

Most of these textures were originally created for Automatic Variants, which is still in Alpha but allows you for example to use all my 15 draugr retextures in your game with the push of a button.

[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hdVWB.jpg[/IMG][/center]

[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/e9ei5.jpg[/IMG][/center]

[color="#FFA500"]=================
Installation
=================[/color]

1. Extract this archive to any folder and then copy the Data folder to your Skyrim folder.

[color="#FFA500"]=================
Uninstall
=================[/color]

Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.

[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZARTf.jpg[/IMG][/center]
